definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: As the saying goes, the devil often appears in the subtle.
sentences.chinese: 俗话说，魔鬼常出现在细微处。

sentences.english: Even though the dukkha that manifests itself is ever so slight, it is enough to make us suspicious.
sentences.chinese: 尽管苦的表现如此细微，却足以引起我们的怀疑。

sentences.english: That sound is, at very minimum, extremely annoying.
sentences.chinese: 这个声音，是最细微程度的干扰。

sentences.english: The differences of the in-between values are so subtle that it wouldn't make much difference.
sentences.chinese: 中间值的区别是如此地细微，它们不会产生大的改变。

sentences.english: The musician can discriminate minute variations in tone.
sentences.chinese: 乐师能辨别声调的各种细微变化。

sentences.english: He perceived the fine difference between the two colors.
sentences.chinese: 他察觉到那两种颜色的细微差异。

sentences.english: They are either manifest or subtle, according to the nature of the gunas.
sentences.chinese: 它们依照三德的本性，或明显，或细微。

sentences.english: There are many fine shadings of status through the social hierarchy.
sentences.chinese: 之间有许多细微的身份区别。

sentences.english: An effective method of observing fine venation from compressed fossil leaves.
sentences.chinese: 一种有效观察压膜化石细微叶结构特征的方法。

sentences.english: They explore every facet of their environment down to the finest detail.
sentences.chinese: 他们探究环境中的每一面，直至最为细微的细节。

sentences.english: The dog pinned its ears back to catch the faint sound.
sentences.chinese: 那条狗的耳朵向后支着，倾听细微的声响。

sentences.english: Our wizards are attuned to picking up on these 'micro-expressions.'
sentences.chinese: 我们的奇才们能注意到这些细微的表情。

sentences.english: Others say that there’s a fine line between the pageants and sexual exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 其他人说，选美和性剥削之间只有非常细微的界线。

sentences.english: The distinction between coupling and composition is subtle but important.
sentences.chinese: 耦合与组合的区别非常细微但是又很重要。

sentences.english: These phenomena are tiny, it should be noted.
sentences.chinese: 这些现象都很细微，应该被记下来。

definition: to sense/to perceive/to become aware of/to detect
to sense/to perceive/to come to realize/to be aware
